name: Mini Garden Cafe
description:
Mini Garden Cafe is a cute and simple relaxation game where you make and sell coffee, bread, and plants to expand your shop and fill up a Dex.

Features

  • Simple Cooking System
  • 100 types of bread
  • 100 types of coffee
  • 100 types of plants
  • Upgrades and floor expansion elements
  • Beautiful and intensely colored visuals
  • Comfortable and relaxing OST
  • 16 to 32 hours of playtime
  • Awesome spaceship launch system!
  • Cool excavators too!
